title: how is that toxic? im just telling what to do and what happened and i get chat resitricted again??
body:
here are the 3 games i dont get it its not toxic its my team trolling me and getting me banned this is not right cmon riot is this right? i just donated 50 dollars to you and you do this? this is how you lose players riot un block my chat please!!!!!!!


Game 1

replies.body: are you kidding? did you even read the first 2 lines?

Incredibly toxic, rude and immature chatlogs. 
You contribute nothing to this community, are clearly without any self-control or respect, and honestly i think you deserve a permban, which you will eventually get unless you shape up your awful behavior.

I find it hard to believe that anyone could be arrogant and spoiled enough to look at those logs and think that behavior is OK.
You did actually read your own chat, right? We could frame this and put it up on the wall as a perfect example of toxicity. There's little we can do to help you if you refuse to see that.

> how is that toxic?

how is this not toxic?
reads first 10 lines atleast 2 times f you yeah youÂ´re just using constructive critizism right? also "donated" 50 dollars is just gold xD

Throughout those three games, you are constantly insulting and harassing the other players in the game. The actions of the other players do not excuse your own poor behavior. If your team is trolling you or being toxic to you first does not mean that you get to be toxic back without consequence.
I dunno, man... he uses "retard" a lot too.
Should have checked the boards instead of playing Pokemon Go first, I needed to find a Grimer but here's all the toxicity I need.
